titles.title: Electronic Prescription Drug Act of 2005
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide incentives to physicians for writing electronic prescriptions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/24/2005--Introduced. Electronic Prescription Drug Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for payments to physicians for writing electronic prescriptions.
